column2: TC-1-P :: Wish List - Add and remove
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/
column3: The OneStopMarket page appears

column2: Log in with the following details: emma.lopez@gmail.com / Password.123
column3: You are logged in and the message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed

column2: Go to My Whish List
column3: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed.

column2: Select the "Sports & Outdoors" category and the "Sports" sub-category
column3: The "Sports" page appears

column2: Click on the heart symbol of any item.
column3: The "My Wish List" page is displayed, with the selected item.

column2: Click on "Remove item".
column3: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed.

column2: TC-2-P :: Wish List - Add two items to the Whish List and then to the cart using the "Add All to Cart" button
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/
column3: The OneStopMarket page appears

column2: Log in with the following details: emma.lopez@gmail.com / Password.123
column3: You are logged in and the message Welcome, Emma Lopez! is displayed

column2: Go to My Whish List
column3: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed.

column2: Select the "Home & Kitchen" category and the "Bedding" sub-category and the "Kids' Bedding" sub-sub-category.
column3: Kids' Bedding" page is displayed

column2: Click on the heart icon of the first item in the list.
column3: The item appears in My Whish List

column2: Select the "Home & Kitchen" category and the "Bedding" sub-category and the "Kids' Bedding" sub-sub-category.
column3: Kids' Bedding" page displayed

column2: Click on the heart icon of the third item in the list.
column3: You have 2 items on your Wish List

column2: Add both items to the Cart with the "Add All to Cart" button
column3: Two error messages appear, indicating that options are required. You are still on the "My Whish List" page

column2: Remove the two items for the Wish List.
column3: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed.

column2: Sign out
column3: The message "You are Signed out" appears then after 5 seconds the Home page is displayed.

column2: TC-3-P :: Product Selection and Cart Verification
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Navigate to One Stop Market website at http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/
column3: Home page loads with category navigation menu visible

column2: Click on "Sports & Outdoors" > "Exercise & Fitness"
column3: Exercise & Fitness category page loads

column2: Scroll down and click on LEIYAN Mens Linen Shorts
column3: Product page loads with details, price ($11.89), and options visible

column2: Choose Color "01-blue" and Size "Medium"
column3: Options are selected and reflected in the UI

column2: Set Quantity to 1 and click "Add to Cart"
column3: Confirmation message appears: "You added LEIYAN Mens Linen Shorts... to your shopping cart."

column2: Navigate to Shopping Cart page
column3: Cart page loads showing the added item with correct details and pricing

column2:
Review cart contents:
Item: LEIYAN Mens Linen Shorts
Color: 01-blue
Size: Medium
Quantity: 1
Price: $11.89
Subtotal: $11.89
Shipping: $5.00 (Flat Rate - Fixed)
Order Total: $16.89
column3: All features are correct

Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter".
column3: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed.

column2:
Enter Email and Password fields.
Click on the buton "Sign In".
column3:
I'm connected on the website. The screen "My Account" is displayed. 
The message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed at the right on the top of the page.

column2: Click on the tab "My Account"
column3: The page "My account" is displayed.

column2: On the "Account Information" section, click on the link "Edit"
column3: The page "Edit Account Information" is displayed.

column2: Click on the check box "Change Email"
column3: "Change Email" section appears below.

column2:
Modify the email.
Fill in "Current Password" field.
Click on the button "Save".
column3:
The page "Customer Login" is displayed with a confirmation message "You saved the account information".
I'm disconnected.
column4: WARNING : cela va changer le password du compte choisi --> il faudra restaurer la base de données pour continuer l'exécution des tests
